customer_name: Laredo Safari and Adventure Park LLC
site_name: Laredo Safari and Adventure Park LLC

citations.narrative:
The safari grounds utilized a program where attendants would row customers out to a partially sheltered lemur island and
let the lemurs engage with the customers without direct control. This would include direct public contact. There is a risk of
direct injury to both the public and the animals in the interaction area. Animals must be under the direct control at all times
during interactive sessions.
Correct by 8/26/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with ______.
n

Sheltered housing facilities. 
The safari grounds utilized a program where attendants would row customers out to a partially sheltered lemur island and 
let the lemurs engage with the customers without direct control. This would include direct public contact. There is a risk of 
direct injury to both the public and the animals in the interaction area. Animals must be under the direct control at all times 
during interactive sessions.
